Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.socket

Class TCPPregameChannel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.socket.TCPPregameChannel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Contextable, Runnable
public class TCPPregameChannel extends Object implements Contextable, Runnable
This class runs a separate thread for request-response handling from client to server during pregame stage.
